document.full_text: syrian security forces and president bashar al-assad loyalists attacked protesters with batons as they left the rifaii mosque in the kfar sousseh district of damascus after friday prayers, a witness said.
document.title: syrian forces beat protesters at mosque: witness
lines_and_colors: syrian security forces and president bashar al-assad loyalists attacked protesters with batons as they left the rifaii mosque in the kfar sousseh district of damascus after friday prayers, a witness said.
